objects.name: Create implementation plan
objects.description: Implementation plans specify how the goals of the strategic plan will be executed. (Citation: ChinaCollectionPlan) (Citation: OrderOfBattle)

external_references.description: Thomas B Inglis. (1946, December 31). COLLECTION PLAN TO IMPLEMENT NATIONAL INTELLIGENCE REQUIREMENTS FOR CHINA. Retrieved March 2, 2017.
Wikipedia contributors. (2016, November 20). Order of battle. Retrieved March 2, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Normally, defender is unable to detect.  Few agencies and commercial organizations may have unique insights.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Normal aspect of adversary planning lifecycle.  May not be done by all adversaries.
